column3: All right, our friends, so today we're going to play a super fun matching game.
Let us show you how it works.
Now this is going to be Smurphy, okay?
And Smurphy is a sneaky little animal.
What animal do you think he is?
A wolf or a fox, right?
It's kind of like a wolf or a fox.
So now Smurphy today, he really, really wants to play this matching game
that is on their screens today, okay?
And what he wants to do is he wants to guess the correct image in between two images.
And you guys will both get two images to start, okay?
So I'll show you how it works.
So let's say if you have Smurphy.
So let's say [id7] has Smurphy today.
If [id7] has Smurphy, then [id7] will help Smurphy choose the correct picture in the box.
And if you don't have Smurphy today, then you will help [id7] sort of decide
and pick which one is the correct one, okay?
The correct one is going to be the picture that's on the box on your screen when you don't have Smurphy.
So let's say [id7] has Smurphy, right?
[id8], are you going to be helping [id7]?
Like are you going to tell her what you see in the box?
Or are you going to guess what picture is in the box?
Yeah, you're going to tell her, right?
What you see in the box.
And [id7], if you have Mr. Smurphy in the, or if you have Mr. Smurphy,
are you going to help Smurphy guess what picture is in the box?
Or are you going to tell what you see in the box?
Do you think it's going to be the guesser or you think it's going to be the teller?
You're going to be the guesser, okay?
So after you make your guess, you're going to see a picture.
If you see a smiley face, it was a great match.
If it was a sad face, it wasn't a match.
But you can help Smurphy later.
Do you guys have any questions?
We'll show you how the first one works.
Can we see Smurphy really quick?
Go ahead and press the blue box on your screen so we can get started.
Alright, looks like you're guessing first.
Alright my friend, you're going to go ahead and describe what you see in the box so [id7] can guess.
Which one looks like a banana?
Great, you're going to pass Smurphy over.
We're going to pass it on to you.
And now we are going to describe what we see in the box to [id8].
Which one looks like a bird?
Go ahead and press it when you think.
Alright, now we're going to pass Smurphy over.
And that's how we're going to play the game.
I know it looks kind of funny, but what do you see in it?
What does it kind of look like?
Do you want to press the one that you think?
Do you want to press it?
It wasn't a match, but you guys will help Smurphy next time.
We see the one that is inside of the box, okay?
Yeah, so what does that look like?
This one looks like a shark to you.
Okay, she says that it looks like a shark.

Okay, well I think you guys have different ideas
of what a shark looks like, right?
So now what do you see [id8]?
You're just going to talk about whatever you see.
I think it looks like a person.
Okay, so now you're trying to guess which one you think looks like a person.

Yeah, it kind of looks like a triangle,
but it kind of looks like it's sitting down.
And it has like a triangle face like this.
Which one do you think it is?
Which one's more for you guys?
We're going to pass Smurphy to [id8], okay?
We're going to pass Smurphy up to [id8], okay?
Thank you for the high fives.

This might be dancing really well.

Doesn't it look like a shark?
